name: Single Point of Failure
description:
Work in Progress -- First Release for Feedback on Gamefeel

You've got your own demons to fight, but that doesn't mean you don't want to be a supportive friend, partner, and family member.  Reply to texts when you can between rounds.  Don't make a mistake -- psychological harm is real harm.

How to Play:

Whan your phone buzzes, hold the right mouse button and enter the arrows to reply.  If you make a mistake you'll offend your texting partner.  If you ignore them for too long they'll be offended.  Reply quickly and accurately.  Also don't die.
